description:
Maska Raid and his Buddy, Blazer Frill, plot to win their match against Tasuku through any means necessary. After a series of mishaps, Blazer Frill convinces Bal to help her win. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Moemoee! Ai to Seigi no Seifuku Senshi Blazer Frill!!
So Lovely! Uniform Warrior of Love and Courage, Blazer Frill!
モエモエーッ! 愛と正義の制服戦士ブレザーフリル!!
